text: “Au gaa lahi goodou gi Zion, dagu gowaa nnoonua dabuaahia, ga gowadu di tenetene i lodo dogu hale hai dalodalo, gaa hila ang gi godou hai tigidaumaha i hongo dogu gowaa dudu tigidaumaha. Dogu Hale Daumaha ga hagaingoo bolo di hale hai dalodalo ang gi nia daangada o nnenua huogodoo.”56.7 Matthew 21.13; Mark 11.17; Luke 19.46
